snippet: A previously unknown leftist group has claimed responsibility for the shootings of members of the neofascist party Golden Dawn this month.
abstract: Previously unknown guerrilla group calling itself the Militant Popular Revolutionary Forces has claimed responsibility for killing two members of Greece’s neofascist party Golden Dawn and has threatened more attacks against the party; authorities are investigating claims, and terrorism experts says group's proclamation is written in style reminiscent of 'far-left terrorism' not seen in Greece since early 1990s.
lead_paragraph: A previously unknown leftist group has claimed responsibility for the shootings of members of the neofascist party Golden Dawn this month.

headline.main: Guerrilla Group Says It Killed 2 From a Greek Extremist Party in an Athens Suburb
headline.print_headline: Guerrilla Group Says It Killed 2 From a Greek Extremist Party in an Athens Suburb
